014package org.jdbi.v3.core.enums.internal;
015
016import java.util.Optional;
017
018import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
019import org.jdbi.v3.core.enums.EnumStrategy;
020import org.jdbi.v3.core.generic.GenericTypes;
021import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.EnumStrategies;
022import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.ColumnMapper;
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.EnumMapper;
024import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.QualifiedColumnMapperFactory;
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.QualifiedType;
026
027public class EnumMapperFactory implements QualifiedColumnMapperFactory {
028    @Override
029    public Optional<ColumnMapper<?>> build(QualifiedType<?> givenType, ConfigRegistry config) {
030        return Optional.of(givenType.getType())
031            .map(GenericTypes::getErasedType)
032            .filter(Enum.class::isAssignableFrom)
033            .map(clazz -> makeEnumArgument((QualifiedType<Enum>) givenType, (Class<Enum>) clazz, config));
034    }
035
036    private static <E extends Enum<E>> ColumnMapper<?> makeEnumArgument(QualifiedType<E> givenType, Class<E> enumClass, ConfigRegistry config) {
037        boolean byName = EnumStrategy.BY_NAME == config.get(EnumStrategies.class).findStrategy(givenType);
038
039        return byName
040            ? EnumMapper.byName(enumClass)
041            : EnumMapper.byOrdinal(enumClass);
042    }
043}
